content:
Global Positioning System

  • ìPlainî civilian GPS

    • Horizontal accuracy of ± 100 m
    • Vertical accuracy of ± 150 m

  • Differential GPS

    • Horizontal accuracy of ± 2 m
    • Vertical accuracy of ± 3 m
    • Requires a differential base station within 100 km

  • Real Time Kinematic GPS

    • Horizontal accuracy of ± 2 cm
    • Vertical accuracy of ± 3 cm
    • Requires a differential base station within 10-20 km
